title: LEGO Moderation Platform
description: I worked as a fulltime intern at The LEGO Group, where I was part of the Big Data Engineering Teem located in Billund (Denmark). I had various tasks related to Front-end Development and UI/UX Design on their internal services. Throughout my stay, I developed a new web app version of their internal Moderation service for LEGO content. I led the development of the Frontend and worked closely with a Fullstack Developer to make their new Moderation portal in ReactJS.

title: SynshalTK - Book your vehicle check
description: Website development as a semester group project at UCN Aalborg for the company SynshalTK. The website was developed by me, where I took major part in the UI/UX Design as well. The website is responsive, SEO optimized and developed with HTML5, CSS3, Vanilla JavaScript.

title: Personal Portfolio - Basic Template
description: This is a basic portfolio website, which I had to develop as part of my Multimedia Design education at UCN Aalborg. The website is responsive, SEO optimized and developed with HTML5, CSS3, Vanilla JavaScript.

title: Diabetesforeningen App - Keep track of your food
description: Website development as a semester group project at UCN Aalborg for the Danish organisation Diabetesforeningen. The website was developed by me, where I took major part in the UI/UX Design as well. The website is made with HTML5, CSS3, Vanilla JavaScript and it is responsive and SEO optimized.

title: NASA - Astronomy Picture of the Day
description: NASA APOD was a personal project from my Multimedia Design education at UCN Aalborg. It is a simple website, where I have used basic HTML5, CSS3 and Vanilla JavaScript to fetch and display their astronomy picture of the day with its description from NASA API point, where I have personal token.

title: Lilleskolernes Music and Teater festival
description: Website development as a semester group project at UCN Aalborg for the Danish Lilleskole Festival. The website was developed by me, where I took major part in the UI/UX Design as well. The website is responsive, SEO optimized and developed with HTML5, CSS3, Vanilla JavaScript.

title: Basic To-do Web App
description: This is a basic to-do web application, which I had to develop as part of my Multimedia Design education at UCN Aalborg. It is responsive and I have used basic HTML5, CSS3, Vanilla JavaScript.

title: ABRACE - Just hygge
description: Website development as a semester group project at UCN Aalborg for the startup company ABRACE. The website was developed by me, where I took major part in the UI/UX Design as well. The website is responsive, SEO optimized and developed with HTML5, CSS3, Vanilla JavaScript.

title: Business Company Website Template
description: This is a simple business website, which I had to develop as part of my Multimedia Design education at UCN Aalborg. The website is responsive and developed with HTML5, CSS3, Vanilla JavaScript.

title: Aalborg Zoo - Christmas Charity Event
description: Website development as a semester group project at UCN Aalborg for Aalborg Zoo Chairty Event. The website was developed by me, where I took major part in the UI/UX Design as well. The website is responsive, SEO optimized and developed with HTML5, CSS3, Vanilla JavaScript.

title: Budgety - Monthly Budget Calculator
description: This is a monthly budget calculator developed with HTML5, CSS3 and Vanilla Javascript. You can add/delete expenses and get your budget calculated automatically. I made this project as part of a JavaScript course I took on Udemy.

title: Dice Game Web App
description: This is a turn base dice game for two, where you could play with a friend from the same computer. I have developed it with HTML5, CSS3 and Vanilla JavaScript and this project is part of a JavaScript course I took on Udemy.

title: React Weather PWA
description: This project is a Weather PWA based on ReactJS. It is responsive, SEO optimized, uses cache and has offline version. I developed it as part of my Web Development education at the Business Academy Aarhus.

title: Twitter Social Media
description: This is a fully functional Social Media platform website like Twitter. I developed this project as part of my Web Development education at the Business Academy Aarhus. It is based on React Remix and MongoDB, and it has SSR.

title: Personal Portfolio Template
description: This is my current personal portfolio. I paid special attention to the UI/UX and I used my Frontend skills to developed it as a React Progressive Web Application. It is responsive, SEO optimized and uses cache first strategy.

title: Art Master - Social Media Platform
description: Art Master is a social media application that allows users to share images with others. This is a fullstack React Ionic project using Firebase. I developed it as a group project at the Business Academy Aarhus.

title: Carefood - Food Sharing Platform
description: Carefood is an web app that allows users to share food. This is a fullstack web application for food waste based on ReactJS, PHP, MySQL. I developed it as a group project at the Business Academy Aarhus.

title: Nord Pixel - Pixel Drawing Web App
description: Nord Pixel is a pixel drawing web application, where you could create an art piece with pixels on a canvas and save it on your computer. I developed it as a personal project and I used ReactJS. It is responsive as well.

title: NFT Collection Showcase
description: This is a ReactJS SPA template for NFT collections showcase. The supported NFT marketplaces are OpenSea and Rarible. I developed this personal project, because of my interest towards digital and AI Art.

title: RP Tools - Digital Role Playing Tools
description: Role Playing Tools is a web app, which can be used for tabletop RPG, or board games. It features different dice dimensions and a name generator. I developed is a personal project using ReactJS.

title: Wizard Mobil Bilpleje - Mobile car cleaning services
description: Website development as a semester group project at UCN Aalborg for Danish car cleaning company Wizard Mobile Car Care. I developed the website with ReactJS, also I took major part in the UI/UX Design. The website is responsive and SEO optimized.

title: Mavreet - Worldwide platform for IT specialists
description: Mavreet was a (English spoken) platform where people with different IT backgrounds could connect, learn, share and discuss. I created it using WordPress and intigrated Invision Power Board community forum.

title: Studenterforum UC - DK national student council
description: I did this project as a freelance work for Studenterforum UC. My task was to develop and maintain a presentational WordPress website for the national student council at the university colleges of Denmark.

title: DSR Horsens - VIA UC Student Council Horsens
description: As a volunteer at the Student Concil in VIA UC Campus Horsens, I was actively engaged with the development and maintenance of their WordPress website for internal and presentational purposes.

title: Digitron Ltd. - Security Systems
description: Digitron Ltd. is a Bulgarian business company for developing and maintaining security systems for any private and public buildings. My task was to develop a WordPress presentational website for the company.

title: IT Community Bulgaria
description: I created IT Community as a Bulgarian platform where people from all areas of IT could learn, share knowldege, help each other and more. It was developed using WordPress and PHPBB3 forum integration which I made myself.

title: WebDevs - Bulgarian IT Community
description: WebDevs was a Bulgarian IT community forum mainly for Web Development, where people could learn, ask & help each other, share knowledge. I used PHPBB3 opensource forum system.

title: PS ART - Photoshop Community
description: In the early days of my Web learning curve, I developed Bulgarian community forum for Photoshop called PS ART. I had used an opensource forum system called PHPBB 2.

title: User Interface & User Experience
description: In my Multimedia Design education the focus was on UI/UX Design, Research and Testing. Here you can find written by me information on various topics related to that. The focus is on developing the best experience for the users.

title: Low-fi & High-fi Prototypes
description: As a UI/UX Designer I have made a lot of prototypes. Starting from back in the days to nowadays, here you can find some of my Low-fidelity and High-fidelity prototypes, which I managed to save throughout the years.

title: Website Miscellaneous
description: Sometimes as a Designer, I had to make different graphic elements like avatars, logos, banners etc. for websites and forums. Either for personal use or for others. You can find collections with some of them here.

title: Website Project Reports
description: In my Multimedia education at UCN Aalborg, I had a lot of group work projects. Here you can find the reports for the websites projects we did, which are already listed under the Web Development Project section.

title: Media, Architecture and People
description: We use Media everyday. It is the main means of mass communication. Here you can find written by me information about Media, Technologies, User understanding, how people and media are related and more.

title: Business and Project Management
description: A successful business needs good project management skills. Here you can find relevant information about managing a project written by me in my Multimedia Design education at UCN Aalborg.

title: The Ultimate Guide
description: Throughout the years I've been gathering all kinds of online sources for learning Web Development, UI/UX, Project Management and more. I use this PDF as my knowledge cheat sheet and I would like to share it.

title: SEO Guide
description: Good SEO has been one of the most important aspects for a successful website for many years. I have been reading about it for a long time. So, recently I started to collect some of the sources, which you can find here.

title: Web Development Miscellaneous
description: This is the place where you can find some of my personal educational information related to Web Development. Every now and then, I write down some useful starter information for myself and I thought it would be nice to share.
